column5: Headed up to Simcoe today to try for some perch. Wasted trip in that regard. However a propane company/station in Brechin has a sign out front and they always have a humerous little message on it.  Todays message  " You know it's spring...because the leafs are out "  No disrespect intended towards the Leafs or there fans. It just made me chuckle.
Yeah they do put some notable ones up and it's usually season based......well usually.LOL Kerry

No offense, I'm a Leaf fan. here's a couple more, and a great photo.  Golf leafs Golf!   What do the Leafs and The Titanic have in common? - They both look good until they hit the ice.  Do you know how many leafs it takes to win the Stanley Cup? - No? Me neither.  Why don't the Maple Leafs drink tea? - Because the Canadiens have all the cups.  Whatâ€™s the difference between the Leafs and a cigarette machine? - The cigarette machine has real PLAYERS  http://ca.f880.mail.yahoo.com/ya/download?...ox&inline=1
